data.eml:eml: Euglossa natesi n. sp., a new species of orchid bee from the Chocó region of Colombia and Ecuador (Hymenoptera: Apidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Parra-H, Alejandro, Ospina-Torres, Rodulfo, Ramírez, Santiago (2006): Euglossa natesi n. sp., a new species of orchid bee from the Chocó region of Colombia and Ecuador (Hymenoptera: Apidae). Zootaxa 1298: 29-36, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173581
